Name: Diego: Mission Red Tomato
About the game: Features of the game: Diego is a very fast and accurate shooter. Diego is armed and can fight back against the rebellious plants. Diego can move from island to island via teleport. Diego is ready to shoot all the dangerous bushes with tomatoes. Diego is afraid of flying saws, but the bullet is able to stop and redirect the saw. History: Diego is a Mexican farmer who is fond of growing tomatoes. Diego accidentally bought a fertilizer with radioactive elements and now the tomatoes are ready to fight back against Diego they no longer want in the jar.
